review: My Dad tested covid positive and his health was deteriorating with the passing of every hour. He had severe CT score and had comorbities. In such a tough time, doctor came to my rescue in getting my dad admitted. It was such a relief to receive his phone call at an urgent moment, when I saw myself so helpless to see my dad‚Äôs health condition and when there was such non availability of ICU bed.  He not only helped my father get admitted but also treated him successfully. He was very proactive in putting my father on the right treatment and kept counselling me on his treatment. He truly leads by example of an exceptional doctor üë®‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è He truly is an angel who saved my father‚Äôs life when I was almost on the verge of losing all hopes.  What distinguishes him as an outstanding doctor, is his proactive ness,  his coordination, timely monitoring, strong conviction and commitment in his treatment, courage and his confidence.  I highly recommend him üëè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr. Samar for my mother when she was having weakness and cough. He talks to the patient and tries to extract the exact health issue being faced, discusses and suggests clearly the treatment and cure. I visited Dr. Samar twice and was very satisfying. He is very comfortable talking and gets the anxiety and worries away. Not only at the clinic, he also was explaining the reports and cleared all our doubts on WhatsApp as well. We also get a call from the clinic, if the patient is doing fine. Overall, it was a very pleasant experience. I would recommend Dr. Samar to everyone who wants to have good treatment with comfortable, friendly, and clear conversation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have actually taken my mom for a consultation to Dr Samarsen as she has been suffering from a mild chest pain very often due to gastric issue. He first listened to her issues with patience and then asked a few questions just to understand what is she actually going through. He then explained her what to do to get rid of the issues and to improve her health condition...He has even suggested some health tips. My mom felt happy with the way the Doctor was. Post that she is actually confident and is following the health tips given by him. Listening to the patients and explaining what actual problem is, is what any individual would expect from a doctor. And this is there in Dr Samarsen and would definitely recommend him.

review: I've had multiple visits with the Doctor for both me and my wife and I've had a consistently good experience throughout. What stands out is that Dr. Samar probes you and asks relevant questions to diagnose well. He is friendly and approachable which makes you very comfortable. The unique thing that I realised is that he is not a typical doctor who is keen on extorting his patients which is a rarity these days. This positive attitude of his reflects in the name of his clinic which is people's polyclinic. I would recommend others to visit the clinic when unwell
